name: ModTools ios
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.
author: Apache Cordova Team

cordova-plugin-ios-camera-permissions.CAMERA_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: So you can take a photo in reply to a member chat
cordova-plugin-ios-camera-permissions.MICROPHONE_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: So you can say what text to reply in a member chat
cordova-plugin-ios-camera-permissions.PHOTOLIBRARY_ADD_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: So you can send a photo in reply to a member chat
cordova-plugin-ios-camera-permissions.PHOTOLIBRARY_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: So you can save a photo when replying to a member chat
